missing.game.items.movable

Class Money

  • java.lang.Object
    • missing.game.items.Item
      • missing.game.items.movable.Movable
        • missing.game.items.movable.Money
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, WorldTile.TileObject

    public class Money
extends Movable
    Class that represents a money object. It has a Location within the Game World, because it can be dropped, and it can be stored for saving and loading for XML purposes.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
